title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6404.10 - Appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6404.10 - Appeals

State Regulations

Any applicant denied financial assistance may file an appeal
if entitled under Part 6401 of this Title. The appeals procedures set forth
under Part 6401 of this Title shall govern any appeal filed pursuant to this
section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6404.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
